title: Matchsafe, "Five Stages of Life", ca. 1890
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded sides and corners, featuring raised decoration of various character's heads, of different ages, young woman at top left, older man at top right, young girl at center, middle-aged man at bottom left, elderly man at bottom right, a few leaf motifs in-between, lid features partially visible fairy or angel-like, winged character who appears to be peering at group below, reverse unadorned except for raised scroll work at edges. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Five Stages of Life", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Plated brass. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-765.
